dict.acceptation: 决心要；将（财产等）遗赠某人；用意志力驱使（某事发生）；
愿意， 希望， 想要；

sent.orig: Your bodies and names will perish, but the river will flow on for ever -- the names of mediocre writers will be forgottern, but those of the great masters will live.
sent.trans: 尔曹身与名俱灭，不废江河万古流。

sent.orig: All those who have contributed towards the gift will sign their names in a large album which will be sent to the headmaster's home.
sent.trans: 凡是凑钱买此礼品的人都要在一本大签名簿上签名，这本签名簿要送到校长家里去。

sent.orig: As a great many people will be visiting the country, the government will be building new hotels, an immense stadium, and a fine new swimming pool.
sent.trans: 因为很多人将要访问这个国家，政府将要建造新的旅馆，一个巨大的体育场和一个漂亮的新游泳池。

sent.orig: Do as he told you and you will find every attempt successful and you will make every shot tell.
sent.trans: 照他的话去做，包你百用百灵，百发百中。

sent.orig: Even if the seas go dry and rocks crumble, my will will remain firm.
sent.trans: 纵然海枯石烂，意志永不动摇。
